snippet.title: TRLE Walkthrough Underworld UB3 - Realm of the Water Pagan (Part 01)
snippet.description:
Underworld Unfinished Business 3 - The Plain of Jars created by Richard Lawther and Titia Drenth.

Download level from skribblerz, trle or laraslevelbase.

STORY
The Lizard King is dead but the other Dark Souls are causing trouble - threatening to send the whole Underworld into chaos. It is believed that the three principle Dark Souls have retreated to the lowest reaches of Lower Hell. Team Anubis were successful in summoning the Ghost Train and now Lara Croft and Demon Smalls are in pursuit of the Dark Souls.
The Ghost Train has arrived at the outer shell of Lower Hell - an endless desert known as The Plain of Jars. It is the last resting place of agnostics and virtuous pagans. Lara Croft and Demon Smalls mission is to discover the path that will take them down into The Asylum - the true Realm of the Damned.
